You can choose to take a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} rolls to gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all ranged {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4, and every +4 thereafter, the penalty increases by –1 and the bonus to damage increases by +2. You must choose to use this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} before making an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} and its effects last until your next turn. The bonus damage does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} or effects that do not deal hit point damage.
